item.title: EP 464 - Comic Con Child Recruitment
item.itunes:title: Comic Con Child Recruitment
item.description:
Today we postpone the apocalypse, eat disgusting gelato (is there any other kind?) and then we delve into a conspiracy that may shatter your view of nerd culture: Comic Con Child Recruitment.
